#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

struct result {
long cur_grid_wheat;
long sum_of_wheat;
};

struct result wheat(int grid)
{
struct result rst;

if (grid == 1) {
rst.cur_grid_wheat = 1;
rst.sum_of_wheat = 1;
} else {
struct result last_rst;
last_rst = wheat(grid - 1);
rst.cur_grid_wheat = last_rst.cur_grid_wheat * 2;
rst.sum_of_wheat = last_rst.sum_of_wheat + rst.cur_grid_wheat;
}

return rst;
}

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
struct result rst;
int grid_index = 0;

if (argc != 2) {
printf("Usage: %s grid_index ", argv[0]);
return -1;
}
grid_index = atoi(argv[1]);

rst = wheat(grid_index);

printf("grid_index: %d cur_grid_wheat: %ld sum_of_wheat: %ld ",
grid_index, rst.cur_grid_wheat, rst.sum_of_wheat);

return 0;
}

class getWheatTotalNum(object):
'''

Return: boolean - æ”¾åˆ°ç¬¬Kæ ¼æ—¶æ˜¯å¦æˆç«‹

def prove(self, k, result):
if k == 1:
if (2 ** 1 - 1) == 1:
result.wheatNum = 1
result.wheatTotalNum = 1
return True
else:
return False

else:
proveOfPreviousOne = self.prove(k - 1, result)
result.wheatNum *= 2
result.wheatTotalNum += result.wheatNum
proveOfCurrentOne = False
if result.wheatTotalNum == (2 ** k - 1):
proveOfCurrentOne = True
if (proveOfPreviousOne & proveOfCurrentOne):
return True
else:
return False


if __name__ == '__main__':

g = getWheatTotalNum()

{

{

}

public function prove($n)
{
if ($n == 1) {
if ((pow(2, 1) - 1) == 1) {
$this->result->wheatNum = 1;
$this->result->wheatTotalNum = 1;

return false;

$proveOfCurrentOne = false;
if ($this->result->wheatTotalNum == (pow(2, $n) - 1)) $proveOfCurrentOne = true;
if ($proveOfCurrentOne && $proveOfPreviousOne) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}
}
}

class Result:

def prove(k, result):
if k == 1:
if (math.pow(2,1) - 1) == 1:
return True
else:

else:
prove1 = prove(k - 1, result)
result.current_wheat *= 2
result.total_wheat += result.current_wheat
prove2 = False
if (math.pow(2, k) - 1) == result.total_wheat:
prove2 = True
if prove1 & prove2:
return True
else:
return False

sult = Result()
prove(53, sult)

class Result():

def prove(k, result):

if k == 1:
if (math.pow(2, 1) - 1) == 1:

return True
else:
return False

last_prove = prove(k-1, result)
result.wheat_num *= 2
result.wheat_totalnum += result.wheat_num

current_prove = False
current_prove = (2**k - 1) == result.wheat_totalnum

return current_prove and last_prove

// C++ å®ç°

using namespace std;

// æ•°å­¦å½’çº³æ³•
// æ€æƒ³ï¼š1.è¯æ˜åŸºæœ¬æƒ…å†µï¼ˆé€šå¸¸n=1ï¼‰æˆç«‹;2.å‡è®¾n=k-1æˆç«‹ï¼Œè¯æ˜
// n=kæˆç«‹ã€‚
// ä½œç”¨ï¼šå½’çº³è§„å¾‹ï¼Œä»è€Œå‡å°‘æ¨å¯¼ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœæ—¶é—´ä¸èµ„æºã€‚
class MathInduction {
private:
long wheatNum = 0; // å½“å‰æ ¼éº¦ç²’æ•°
long wheatTotalNum = 0; // å½“å‰æ€»å…±éº¦ç²’æ•°

public:
/**
* @description: ç”¨é€’å½’&æ•°å­¦å½’çº³æ³•è¯æ˜èˆæ±—ç‹èµéº¦æ€»æ•°=2^k - 1
* @param {type} k- æ£‹æ ¼æ•°
* @return:
*/
bool wheatProve(int k) {
// è¯æ˜n=1æˆç«‹
if (k == 1) {
// n = 1æ˜¾ç„¶æˆç«‹ï¼Œä¸ç”¨è¯æ˜ã€‚
wheatNum = 1;
wheatTotalNum = 1;
return true;
} else {
// å‡è®¾n=k-1æˆç«‹
bool flagProvePrev = wheatProve(k - 1);

// è¯æ˜n=kæˆç«‹
wheatNum *= 2;
wheatTotalNum += wheatNum;
bool flagProve;
if (wheatTotalNum == (pow(2, k) - 1)) {
flagProve = true;
} else {
flagProve = false;
}

// ç›¸ç­‰åˆ™æˆç«‹
if (flagProve && flagProvePrev) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}
}
/**
* Desciption: è·å–éº¦ç²’æ€»æ•°
*/
long getWheatNum(void) {
return wheatTotalNum;
}
};
